document_data.mainbody:
Denneth Rhardantan was a man from Mistledale in the late 15 century DR.
Storm Silverhand claimed he had many fast horses.
As of Mirtul in 1479 DR, he owed Storm Silverhand much money.
In Mirtul of the , Storm Silverhand lured out a number of highknights through a portal to Shadowdale. She convinced their leader, Eskrel Starbridge, to trade a teleport ring in his keeping, originally belonging to Queen Filfaeril Obarskyr, for the name of a man who owed her much coin and had enough fast horses for his entire troop to make it back to Cormyr. The mans name was Denneth Rhardantan she also yielded a word, "glimmerdeep", which would make him give them away for free to whoever asked.
